mapper.insert: INSERT INTO write_exercise (exercise_name, exercise_answer, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, et_id) VALUES(#{exercise_name}, #{exercise_answer}, #{choice1}, #{choice2}, #{choice3}, #{choice4}, #{et_id})
mapper.select: SELECT write_exercise.exercise_id, write_exercise.exercise_name, write_exercise.exercise_answer, write_exercise.choice1, write_exercise.choice2, write_exercise.choice3, write_exercise.choice4, exercise_topic.et_name FROM write_exercise INNER JOIN exercise_topic ON write_exercise.et_id=exercise_topic.et_id WHERE exercise_topic.et_id=#{et_id}
